thread.title: Watch Super Bowl 51 Commercials, From Worst to Best
thread.title_full: Watch Super Bowl 51 Commercials, From Worst to Best

title: Watch Super Bowl 51 Commercials, From Worst to Best
text:
All Stories 
As Atlanta watched their beloved Falcons fumble Super Bowl 51 and witness the Patriots' historic comeback, at least they could take solace in this year's solid crop of super commercials. While not all of them were well-received, Super Bowl Sunday ads ranged the gamut from simple silliness to cinematic epicness. Here are some of the best (and worst) commercials from last night's big game.
